activities:
Archer''''s out-of-the-box GRC solutions provide the foundation for a
best-in-class enterprise governance, risk and compliance program. They include Policy, Threat, Asset, Risk, Business Continuity, Incident, Loss Event, Vendor, Audit and Compliance Management.

All Archer solutions are built on the award-winning Archer SmartSuite Framework. This highly flexible platform empowers clients to tailor Archer solutions to their unique requirements, build new GRC applications and integrate with existing systems. 

Archer clients have control over their instances to create fields and upload data to the systems.  Archer does not interact with the applications or data that a client has uploaded into the system.
corpofftitle1: Director of Finance and Special Projects
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: The Archer SmartSuite Framework is compliant with the private sector BITS certification for information security.  We operate our product in a SAS7- Type II colocation facility. Our backup materials are housed by a Safe Harbor certified entity (Iron Mountain).
